locations.title: Viridian Amber Medallion +2
locations.description: In a chest found dropping down twice past Haligtree Town Plaza and doubling back to jump down to a storage room in the reverse direction

locations.title: Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman
locations.description: In a chest, guarded by many Kindred of Rot, accessed through a hole in the roof of a building after Drainage Channel

locations.title: Marika's Soreseal
locations.description: Past an Imp Statue barrier found dropping down from the bridge with the patrolling Putrid Avatar

locations.title: Pearldrake Talisman +2
locations.description: Up a ladder after the Haligtree Town Site of Grace then jumping across the gap
